directions: Combine kale, mango, pineapple, 1 cup almond-coconut milk, banana, chia seeds, and flax seed in a high-performance blender (such as Vitamix®); blend until smooth. Add more coconut milk beverage if mixture is too thick.
ingredients: 1 cup almond-coconut milk, or more if needed
title: Vegan Kale Smoothie
